Important message from NMPED on Summer School:

K-5 Plus programs will not be able to go forward this summer due to the public health-related uncertainty brought on by COVID-19. PED explored potential options for implementing this program, but the statutory requirements limit the options for doing so safely. Under the current conditions, it would be difficult to adhere to public health orders and meet program requirements, which include offering the program prior to the start of the school year, students remaining with the same teacher during the regular school year, and participation-based funding. The safety of our students and educators is our first priority.
